name: Career Crown International
overview:
Career Crown International is a professional management consultancy and training company in India and UAE; offering a range of business intelligence and knowledge dissemination services to people and companies in the regions.

Services Include:

1) New Company Planning & Establishment in India & UAE 2) Strategic and Business Planning 3) Product / Brand Management 4) Sales Consultancy and Functional Support 5) Human Resource Management Consultancy 6) Industrial Relations Consultancy 7) Corporate Governance Consultancy 8) Organizational Development Consultancy 9) Change Management Consultancy 10) Professional Trainings (25+ Categories)

The company’s consultancy and training programs have recently been rated as 5-star by employers in UAE; making it the 1st of its kind in approach, quality and affordability.
